Instruction: Sauté garlic and onions in olive oil over medium heat until onions are translucent. Add dill, thyme, salt, and pepper; cook briefly to infuse flavors.

Whisk together the Dijon mustard, balsamic vinegar, and beef stock in a saucepan. Simmer over medium-high heat, then reduce heat and continue simmering for 5 minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in the sour cream; season with salt and pepper to taste.
